title: The 25 Most Intriguing NBA Playoff People With Ryen Russillo
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo to discuss the NBA’s delightful play-in game format for the bottom NBA playoff seeds (2:30). Then Bill shares his list of the 25 most intriguing people in the 2020 NBA playoffs (21:03).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
